mapper.update: update b_planfile set planfileid=planfileid ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,planTypeID=#{planTypeID} ,planYear=#{planYear} ,planNo=#{planNo} ,dispatchunit=#{dispatchunit} ,dispatchdate=#{dispatchdate} ,planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} ,planEndDate=#{planEndDate} ,fileNameList=#{fileNameList} ,delFlag=#{delFlag} ,remark=#{remark} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} where planfileid=#{planfileid}

update b_planfile set planfileid=planfileid ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,planTypeID=#{planTypeID} ,planYear=#{planYear} ,planNo=#{planNo} ,dispatchunit=#{dispatchunit} ,dispatchdate=#{dispatchdate} ,planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} ,planEndDate=#{planEndDate} ,fileNameList=#{fileNameList} ,delFlag=#{delFlag} ,remark=#{remark} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} where 1=1 and planfileid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and planfileid =#{Where_Id} and planfileid=#{Where_planfileid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and planTypeID=#{Where_planTypeID} and planYear=#{Where_planYear} and planNo=#{Where_planNo} and dispatchunit=#{Where_dispatchunit} and dispatchdate=#{Where_dispatchdate} and planBeginDate=#{Where_planBeginDate} and planEndDate=#{Where_planEndDate} and fileNameList=#{Where_fileNameList} and delFlag=#{Where_delFlag} and remark=#{Where_remark} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime}
mapper.select: select t.planfileid "planfileid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.planTypeID "planTypeID", t.planYear "planYear", t.planNo "planNo", t.dispatchunit "dispatchunit", t.dispatchdate "dispatchdate", t.planBeginDate "planBeginDate", t.planEndDate "planEndDate", t.fileNameList "fileNameList", t.delFlag "delFlag", t.remark "remark", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", lc.companyname "companyname", lg.graindepotname "graindepotname", bu.username "createusername" from b_planfile t LEFT JOIN l_company lc on lc.companyid=t.companyid LEFT JOIN l_graindepot lg on lg.graindepotid=t.graindepotid LEFT JOIN base_user bu on bu.userid=t.createuserid where planfileid=#{planfileid}

select t.planfileid "planfileid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.planTypeID "planTypeID", t.planYear "planYear", t.planNo "planNo", t.dispatchunit "dispatchunit", t.dispatchdate "dispatchdate", t.planBeginDate "planBeginDate", t.planEndDate "planEndDate", t.fileNameList "fileNameList", t.delFlag "delFlag", t.remark "remark", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime" from b_planfile t where 1=1 and t.planfileid=#{planfileid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.planTypeID=#{planTypeID} and t.planYear=#{planYear} and t.planNo=#{planNo} and t.dispatchunit=#{dispatchunit} and t.dispatchdate=#{dispatchdate} and t.planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} and t.planEndDate=#{planEndDate} and t.fileNameList=#{fileNameList} and t.delFlag=#{delFlag} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime}

select t.planfileid "planfileid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.planTypeID "planTypeID", t.planYear "planYear", t.planNo "planNo", t.dispatchunit "dispatchunit", t.dispatchdate "dispatchdate", t.planBeginDate "planBeginDate", t.planEndDate "planEndDate", t.fileNameList "fileNameList", t.delFlag "delFlag", t.remark "remark", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime" from b_planfile t where 1=1 and t.planfileid=#{planfileid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.planTypeID=#{planTypeID} and t.planYear=#{planYear} and t.planNo=#{planNo} and t.dispatchunit=#{dispatchunit} and t.dispatchdate=#{dispatchdate} and t.planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} and t.planEndDate=#{planEndDate} and t.fileNameList=#{fileNameList} and t.delFlag=#{delFlag} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime}
mapper.delete: delete from b_planfile where 1=1 and planfileid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and planfileid =#{Where_Id} and planfileid=#{Where_planfileid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and planTypeID=#{Where_planTypeID} and planYear=#{Where_planYear} and planNo=#{Where_planNo} and dispatchunit=#{Where_dispatchunit} and dispatchdate=#{Where_dispatchdate} and planBeginDate=#{Where_planBeginDate} and planEndDate=#{Where_planEndDate} and fileNameList=#{Where_fileNameList} and delFlag=#{Where_delFlag} and remark=#{Where_remark} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime}
mapper.select: select t.planfileid "planfileid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.planTypeID "planTypeID", t.planYear "planYear", t.planNo "planNo", t.dispatchunit "dispatchunit", t.dispatchdate "dispatchdate", t.planBeginDate "planBeginDate", t.planEndDate "planEndDate", t.fileNameList "fileNameList", t.delFlag "delFlag", t.remark "remark", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime" from b_planfile t where 1=1 and t.planfileid=#{planfileid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.planTypeID=#{planTypeID} and t.planYear=#{planYear} and t.planNo like #{planNo} and t.dispatchunit=#{dispatchunit} and t.dispatchdate=#{dispatchdate} and t.planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} and t.planEndDate=#{planEndDate} and t.fileNameList=#{fileNameList} and t.delFlag=#{delFlag} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime}

select count(*) from b_planfile t where 1=1 and t.planfileid=#{planfileid} and t.planfileid!=#{NoId} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.planTypeID=#{planTypeID} and t.planYear=#{planYear} and t.planNo like #{planNo} and t.dispatchunit=#{dispatchunit} and t.dispatchdate=#{dispatchdate} and t.planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} and t.planEndDate=#{planEndDate} and t.fileNameList=#{fileNameList} and t.delFlag=#{delFlag} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime}
select t.planfileid "planfileid", t.planNo "planNo" from b_planfile t where 1=1 and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
